document_data.novels: ''[[Homeland]]''; [[Realms of the Underdark|''Realms of the Underdark'': "The Fires of Narbondel"]]
document_data.Activities: The role was delegated to a noble daughter of a noble drow house. Their job was to tend to the needs of a drow infant for ten years, teaching her or him the [[Drow language]] (including [[Drow Sign Language]]), how to manifest her or his spell-like abilities, and above all to teach the child their place in drow society, all while putting them to work.
